metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5342 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The choice module in Moodle through 2.6.11, 2.7.x before 2.7.11, 2.8.xbefore 2.8.9, and 2.9.x before 2.9.3 allows remote authenticated users tobypass intended access restrictions by visiting a URL to add or deleteresponses in the closed state.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
